message: Let's be fair, I'll take the lion's share, but you still get a decent amount. Let's end this quickly.
I'm not afraid of a fight, let's see how long you can last!
I'm not going to let you bully me, but I'm also not going to let this money slip away. This is my last offer. Take it or leave it.
You're getting desperate, I can smell it. I'm not afraid to take all.
This is my final offer. We're both losing money, and this is the only way we can both come out with something. Accept it, or we both get nothing.
